name: groceries-food
descriptions: this expense category covers amounts spent on groceries like food.

name: utilities
descriptions: this expense category covers hydro, water, and gas utilities.

name: rent
description: this expense category covers rental income if you are renting a property from a landlord (i.e. you pay rent).

name: employment-income
description: this income category is for money received from a job you are employed at.

name: misc-income
description: this income category is for money received which cannot be categorized in any other income categories (i.e. tax refund).
